lyrics:
(originally by Earth, Wind & Fire)
Do you remember
The 28th night of September?
Love was changin' the minds of pretenders
Or chasin' the clouds away
Our hearts were ringin'
In the key bed, our souls were singin'
As we danced in the night, remember
How the stars stole the night away
I-I see that you remember
Ai, ai, dancin' in September
Ai, ai, never was a cloudy day
My thoughts are with you
Holding hands with your heart to see you
Don't need blue talk in love, remember
How we knew that was here to stay
Now, December
Found the love that we shared in September
Only blue talk in love, remember
The love that we share today
I-I see that you remember
Ai, ai, dancin' in September
Ai, ai, never was a cloudy day
I-I see that you remember
Ai, ai, dancin' in September
Ai, ai, golden dreams were shiny days
Do you remember
The 28th night of September?
I-I see that you remember
Ai, ai, dancin' in September
Ai, ai, never was a cloudy day
I-I see that you remember
Ai, ai, dancin' in September
Ai, ai, golden dreams were shiny days
And there never was a cloudy day
There never was a cloudy day
title: September Lyrics
